name: supabase-docs
title: Supabase Documentation
description: Quickly search Supabase documentation and open it in the browser
author: Isaiah-Hamilton

commands.name: search-documentation
commands.title: Search Documentation
commands.subtitle: Supabase
commands.description: Search Supabase documentation and open it in the browser

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
